typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'public',
	fileName: 'trip-data.csv',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false) ~> TripDataCSV
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'public',
	fileName: 'fares-data.csv',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false) ~> FaresDataCSV
InnerJoinWithTripFares aggregate(groupBy(payment_type),
	average_fare = avg(toInteger(total_amount)),
		total_trip_distance = sum(toInteger(trip_distance))) ~> AggregateByPaymentType
TripDataCSV, FaresDataCSV join(TripDataCSV@medallion == FaresDataCSV@medallion
	&& TripDataCSV@hack_license == FaresDataCSV@hack_license
	&& TripDataCSV@vendor_id == FaresDataCSV@vendor_id
	&& TripDataCSV@pickup_datetime == FaresDataCSV@pickup_datetime,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerJoinWithTripFares
AggregateByPaymentType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SynapseAnalyticsSink
